resources.string: మేము మా సర్వర్‌ని చేరుకోలేకపోతున్నాము. దయచేసి మీ ఇంటర్నెట్ను ఆన్ చేసినట్లు చూసుకోండి.
తెలియని లోపం ఏదో సంభవించింది. దయచేసి దరఖాస్తును మూసివేసి, మళ్లీ తెరవండి. లోపం కొనసాగితే, మీ ప్రాజెక్ట్ సమన్వయకర్తను సంప్రదించండి.
యాప్‌ను ఆంగ్లంలో చూపించడానికి అవసరమైన డేటాను పొందుతున్నాం

Karya Participation Consent Form

Thank you for your participation on the Karya platform. This document describes the goals of the platform and the various steps involved in your participation. You have no obligation to participate. You may end your participation at any time.

Purpose of the Platform

The goal of the platform is to offer paid digital work to various users. Through the Karya smartphone app, you can get access to simple tasks that can be completed on your smartphone. You will get paid for all the correctly completed tasks. The type of task assigned to you will depend on the specific study you are participating in. For instance, a task may require you to record yourself speaking out a sentence. Regardless, the Karya app will provide you clear instructions on how to complete each task in your regional language. The app will also inform you how much you will be paid if you complete the task correctly. You can withdraw from participation at any time, and you will be paid for the tasks you have completed till that point.

Procedure
  1. To begin, you will be introduced to the Project Coordinator for your location. This person will be your point of contact for help related to the project.
  2. Your project coordinator will provide you with instructions and if necessary, help you to download and install the “Karya” mobile application on your smartphone.
  3. Your project coordinator will give you a “16-digit Access Code”. You need to enter the code during the registration process. Each access code can be used only once. Therefore, do not share the access code with anyone else.
  4. The registration process may require you to sign-in with your phone number. This information will be used to identify you on the platform when you close the application and open it again.
  5. In addition, we will also collect some demographic information about you, e.g., your age range, gender, education level, etc.
  6. The app will also ask you to choose a profile picture. This picture will only be used for display in the application and will not be stored in our platform.
  7. To receive tasks on our platform, the app must “sync” with our server. This operation will submit all the tasks you have completed on our platform to the server and receive any new tasks. After registration, the app will automatically sync with our server. You can trigger subsequent syncs by clicking on the sync button in the app.
  8. In the main app screen (dashboard), you will be presented with a list of different type of tasks assigned to you, along with information on each type of task: number of tasks assigned, number of tasks completed, number of tasks submitted, etc. For each type of task, the app will provide detailed instructions on how you must complete the task, and how much you will be paid if you complete the task correctly. Please pay attention to these instructions before proceeding with the tasks.
  9. At the end of your participation, we request you to delete the application from your phone. Should you want, your project coordinator will aid you in installing, configuring, and deleting the application.
  10. After the end of the study, we may request a short interview with you to gather your feedback and understand your experience of using our platform.
Risks and Benefits
  1. This platform only offers supplemental work. As a result, we have a limited number of tasks available. Do not let your participation in our platform interfere with your current work. Your participation will only require upto one to two hours of your time every day.
  2. We recommend doing the provided work in a patient manner. This will allow you to submit more accurate responses and will also make sure you don’t spend too much time on the smartphone. Spending too much time on a smartphone could be bad for your eyes and may affect your social life. We recommend not working for more than 2 hours a day.
  3. If we lend you a smartphone to participate (as part of a research study), we trust you to use the provided smartphone responsibly. If you have not used a smartphone before, it can be overwhelming. We are happy to help you in any and every way possible. You can contact us via your project coordinator.
Personal Information

Any personal information we collect during the study will only be used to identify you during the duration of the study. We will delete all personal information as soon as the study is over. We will not share your personal information with anyone. However, we may use pictures from the study in presentations or posters without identifying specific individuals. We will request your permission before taking pictures and obtain your permission to use those pictures in our presentations or posters. Not providing consent for taking pictures will not disqualify you from participating in the study. For additional information or concerns about how Microsoft handles your personal information, please see the Microsoft Privacy Statement, https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=521839

Payment for Participation

You will be paid for all correctly completed tasks on the platform. The app or your porject coordinator will also provide you feedback on how well you are performing on the platform so that you can improve your responses for future tasks. We will work with you and your project coordinator to identify the best mode of payment. We will collect and store your payment information for the duration of the study. We will pay you periodically for all your tasks that have undergone quality verification. We will delete all payment information as soon as your participation is completed. Please contact your project coordinator if you have any queries regarding payments.

Dataset Collected from the Study

We will use the dataset collected as part of your responses to different tasks for further research and will aim to release them publicly for research purposes. Most datasets will contain only text or audio data that is not associated with personally identifiable information. In situations where a dataset does contain personally identifiable information (e.g., video), we will obtain explicit consent from you before providing such a task. If you have any questions regarding how the dataset will be used, please feel free to ask us through your project coordinator or using the phone number provided below.

Contact Information

Should you have any questions concerning the project, you can contact Vivek Seshadri by phone at 0000000000. Should you have any questions about your rights as a research subject, please report your concern via email to Microsoft Research Ethics Program Feedback: MSRStudyfeedback@microsoft.com. In case you do not have access to email, you can contact your project coordinator, and have her relay your concerns.

Consent

By clicking “I agree” below, you confirm that the goals and the procedure for participation on the platform was explained to you, you had a chance to ask questions before beginning your participation, and all your questions were answered satisfactorily. By clicking “I agree” below, you voluntarily consent to participate, and you do not give up any legal rights you have as a study participant. On behalf of Karya Inc, we thank you for your contribution and look forward to your participation. Do you understand and consent to these terms?
పదహారు నంబర్ల యాక్సెస్ కోడ్‌ని నమోదు చేయండి
దయచేసి వేచి ఉండండి. ఫైల్‌లు మరియు ఇతర ఆస్తులను డౌన్‌లోడ్ చేస్తోంది.
మీరు నమోదు చేసిన కోడ్ ఇప్పటికే ఉపయోగించబడింది. దయచేసి మీ ప్రాజెక్ట్ సమన్వయకర్తను సంప్రదించండి.
మీ పది అంకెల ఫోను నంబర్‌ను నమోదు చేయండి
మేము మీ నంబర్‌కు ఓటిపి ని పంపలేకపోయాము. దయచేసి మళ్లీ ప్రయత్నించండి.
మేము మీకు ఆరు అంకెల ఓటిపి ని సందేశం ద్వారా పంపాము. దయచేసి దిగువున ఆ ఓటిపి ని నమోదు చేయండి.
మీరు చెల్లని ఓటిపి ని నమోదు చేసారు
దయచేసి మీ ప్రొఫైల్ చిత్రాన్ని క్లిక్ చేయండి. మీకు అది అక్కర్లె అనుకుంటే మీరు ఈ దశను దాటవేయవచ్చు
దయచేసి మీ లింగాన్ని ఎంచుకోండి. మీరు మీ లింగాన్ని చెప్పాలి అనుకోకపోతె, మీరు ఈ దశను దాటవేయవచ్చు
దయచేసి మీ పుట్టిన సంవత్సరాన్ని నమోదు చేయండి
మీ ఫోన్ నంబర్ ఇప్పటికే నమోదు చేయబడింది. దయచేసి మరొక ఫోన్ నంబర్‌తో ప్రయత్నించండి.
ఆంగ్లంలో మీ నైపుణ్యాల గురించి మా దగ్గర మూడు ప్రశ్నలు ఉన్నాయి. ఆ ప్రశ్నలకు, దయచేసి అవును కోసం టిక్ ను నొక్కండి లేదు అంటే క్రాస్ ను నొక్కండి
కార్మికుల కోసం కొత్త నైపుణ్యాన్ని నమోదు చేస్తున్నాం
కార్మికుల కోసం కొత్త నైపుణ్యాన్ని నమోదు చేయడం విఫలమైంది
మీకు ఏదైనా ఇతర భాష తెలిస్తే, దయచేసి ఆ భాషను దిగువున ఉన్న భగం నుంచి ఎంచుకోండి
You have completed tasks that can be submitted to the server. Do you want to submit the tasks now?
This task consists of a set of sentences. The worker is expected to record themselves reading out each sentence, one sentence at a time
This task consists of a set of stories. The worker is expected to record themselves reading out each story, one sentence at a time
This task consists of a set of recordings. The worker is expected to verify the given recording and text.
You have to record yourself speaking out this sentence
To start recording, press this button. It will turn red indicating that the recording has started.
Once you are done recording, press this button again to stop the recording
The app will play back the recorded audio. Listen to it carefully to ensure it is correct and that there is no other background voice.
If your recording is not correct, you can record again using the record button.
If you are happy with the recording, you can press this button to go to the next sentence.
You can press this button to go to the previous sentence.
